meta.title: Pricing - Flexible AI Solutions for Your Business | Proof of Concept
meta.description: Transparent pricing for AI-powered solutions. Custom packages for startups to enterprises. Get your proof of concept without breaking the bank. Contact us for a quote.

hero.title: Get started with
hero.subtitle: CorballyConcepts' pricing is tailored to your specific team's needs.

benefits: AI platform fee based on your needs incl. optional add-ons
Flexible scaled pricing based on answers per month
Support and integration with your tools included with every plan

problem.label: What problem are you trying to solve?
problem.placeholder: Building an AI assistant for my docs, rolling out internal support agent etc.

stats.description: Monthly questions answered unblocking thousands of developers instantly.
Global self-help coverage with multi-language tech support.
Improvement in support response time with AI-Powered Developer Support.
Decrease in support tickets with instant AI answers.

features.title: Explainable and accurate answers
features.description: Minimal hallucinations with state-of-the-art answer engine grounded in source materials, rigorously tested across 100+ deployments.

features.title: Comprehensive integrations
features.description: 30+ data source integrations that are optimized for LLMs and automatically refresh, ensuring up-to-date information.

features.title: Off-the-shelf deployments
features.description: 1-click deployments including website chatbot widgets, Slack bots, Discord bots, and APIs for easy integration.

features.title: Actionable analytics suite
features.description: Get insight in to real user intentions by analyzing conversations and use the platform to find gaps in your documentation.

features.title: Enterprise-grade security
features.description: Secure by design with SOC II Type II certification and advanced PII detection & masking technology for data security.

features.title: End-to-end implementation success
features.description: Full support from our technical team including answer debugging, managed source setup, and custom onboarding to ensure your successful deployment

testimonials.quote: CorballyConcepts is the only LLM-based system I trust to put in front of our customers
testimonials.author: Rusty Wilson

testimonials.quote: Our team did its best to stump CorballyConcepts, and time and time again, it delivered helpful, accurate responses.
testimonials.author: Michael Ellis

testimonials.quote: CorballyConcepts is much better at answering questions about Prisma than ChatGPT is
testimonials.author: Soren Schmidt

questions.question: What LLM do you use?
questions.answer: We use a combination of state-of-the-art language models optimized for technical documentation and customer support scenarios.

questions.question: How accurate is CorballyConcepts?
questions.answer: Our platform maintains industry-leading accuracy through rigorous testing across 100+ deployments and continuous improvement of our answer engine.

questions.question: How do you solve hallucinations?
questions.answer: We use advanced grounding techniques, source citation, and confidence scoring to minimize hallucinations and ensure reliable answers.

questions.question: Do you use fine-tuning or RAG?
questions.answer: We use a hybrid approach combining the best of both RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and fine-tuning for optimal performance.

questions.question: What support does CorballyConcepts provide?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive support including technical onboarding, answer debugging, managed source setup, and ongoing optimization assistance.

questions.question: Do you have a special tier for non-commercial OSS?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for open source projects and non-commercial use cases. Contact our team for details.

questions.question: Who do I reach out to for commercial and billing questions?
questions.answer: Please contact our sales team at sales@corballyconcepts.com for all commercial inquiries and billing questions.

messages.success: Thank you! We will contact you shortly.
